## Pages
- [Create New Invoice](/createinvoice): No description available
- [Customers - Invoice Management System](/customers): Manage your customer database and track customer interactions
- [Dashboard](/dashboard): Manage your invoices, customers, products and payments efficiently
- [Edit Invoice - Invoice Management System](/editinvoice): No description available
- [Invoices](/invoices): Create, manage and track all your invoices in one place
- [Login - Invoice App](/auth): Login to manage your invoices.
- [Parties - Invoice Management](/parties): Manage all your business parties
- [Payments - Invoice Management System](/payments): Track and manage all payment transactions
- [Products & Services - Invoice Management System](/products): Manage your product and service inventory
- [Reports - Invoice Management](/reports): View and export detailed reports
- [Settings - Invoice Management System](/settings): Configure your account and business settings
